docs.lead_paragraph: Results about the promising gout treatment Arcalyst come from a midstage trial involving a limited number of patients, but a larger study is planned for next year.

headline.main: A Regeneron Drug Minimized Recurrence of Gout in Clinical Trial
headline.print_headline: Arcalyst, a Regeneron Drug, Minimized Recurrence of Gout in Clinical Trial

docs.snippet: Results about the promising gout treatment Arcalyst come from a midstage trial involving a limited number of patients, but a larger study is planned for next year.
